org.minijson.builder

Interface RichJsonBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndentedJsonBuilder, JsonBuilder, JsonStructureBuilder

    public interface RichJsonBuilder
extends IndentedJsonBuilder, JsonStructureBuilder
    JSON builder using internal JSON node variables. In contract, BareJsonBuilder only uses JDK Map and List.
